description:
Checkers game, played as American/English official rules

Your goal: capture all your opponentâ€™s pieces.

This Checkers game supports both 1 player and 2 player game play, so you can play against friends or test your skills against a challenging computer opponent.

Intuitive touch controls make it easy to play checkers on your device, just tap a piece and then tap where you want it to go.

Features :

- 1 player or 2 players mode available
- quick response time
- animated moves
- easy to use interface design
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- 3D and 2D views, at different angles
- Unlimited Undos
name: Checkers Master
